linearRegression_test.cpp

00001 //===========================================================================
00054 //===========================================================================
00055 #include "Array/ArrayIo.h"
00056 #include "LinAlg/LinearRegression.h"
00057 
00058 using namespace std;
00059 
00060 // Data for the x-vectors.
00061 double data_x[8][2] = {
00062   {0.5, 1.0},
00063   {1.5, 1.0},
00064   {2.0, 1.0},
00065   {2.5, 1.0},
00066   {3.0, 1.0},
00067   {3.0, 1.0},
00068   {3.5, 1.0},
00069   {4.0, 1.0}
00070 };
00071 
00072 // Data for the corresponding y-vectors.
00073 double data_y[8][2] = {
00074   {0.5, 1.0},
00075   {1.0, 1.0},
00076   {0.5, 1.0},
00077   {1.5, 1.0},
00078   {0.5, 1.0},
00079   {1.0, 1.0},
00080   {2.0, 1.0},
00081   {1.5, 1.0}
00082 };
00083 
00084 // Data for x-vectors for the model test.
00085 double data_test[3][2] = {
00086   {2.5, 1.0},
00087   {1.0, 1.0},
00088   {1.75, 1.0}
00089 };
00090 
00091  
00092 int main()
00093 {
00094     Array< double >   x( 8, 2 ),      // Matrix of all x-vectors.
00095                       y( 8, 2 ),      // Matrix of all y-vectors.
00096                       x_test( 3, 2 ), // Matrix of all x-vectors used
00097                                       // for testing the model.
00098                       yout,           // Current y-vector-approximation
00099                                       // of the model.
00100                       A,              // Regression coefficient A.
00101                       b;              // Regression coefficient b.
00102     unsigned          i, j;           // Counter variables.
00103 
00104 
00105     // Copy data of all x/y-vectors to matrices:
00106     for ( i = 0; i < 8; i++ ) 
00107     {
00108         for (j = 0; j < 2; j++ ) {
00109             x( i, j ) = data_x[ i ][ j ];
00110             y( i, j ) = data_y[ i ][ j ];
00111             if ( i < 3 ) x_test( i, j ) = data_test[ i ][ j ];
00112         }
00113     }
00114 
00115     // Create empty regression model:
00116     LinearRegression model;
00117 
00118     // Add all x/y-vector-pairs to the model:
00119     model.train( x, y );
00120 
00121     // Extract regression coefficients of the final model:
00122     A = model.A( );
00123     b = model.b( );
00124     cout << "A = ";
00125     writeArray( A, cout );
00126     cout << "b = ";
00127     writeArray( b, cout );
00128     cout << "\n\n";
00129 
00130     // Test y-vector-approximations for all x-vectors
00131     // given by the model without these x/y-pairs:
00132     for ( i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
00133     {
00134         model.leaveOneOut( x[ i ], y[ i ], yout );
00135         cout << "data vector x:                         ";
00136         writeArray( x[ i ], cout );
00137         cout << "corresponding data vector y:           ";
00138         writeArray( y[ i ], cout );
00139         cout << "model approximation for data vector y: ";
00140         writeArray( yout, cout );
00141         cout << endl;
00142     }
00143 
00144     // Testing final regression model for some
00145     // vector pairs:
00146     cout << "\n\n";
00147     for ( i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00148     {
00149         model.recall( x_test[ i ], yout );
00150         cout << "Given x-vector:                      ";
00151         writeArray( x_test[ i ], cout );
00152         cout << "y-vector-approximation of the model: ";
00153         writeArray( yout, cout );
00154         cout << endl;
00155     }
00156 
00157     return 0;
00158 }
